DOC.brief_summary: The study will investigate the effect on growth hormone replacement in patients with isolated growth hormone deficiency on body composition, especially visceral fat mass.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Somatropin in Adult Patients With Isolated Growth Hormone Deficiency
DOC.detailed_description: The study was terminated on 15-Dec-2008 due to poor recruitment. Although 9 Patients were enrolled, no patient was randomized nor treated with somatropin. No safety reasons contributed to the termination.
DOC.criteria: Males and females between 18 and 65 years of age Isolated growth hormone deficiency Isolated growth hormone deficiency by childhood onset Diabetes mellitus type 1 or 2
